main event: A housewife and two marines observed a white flickering object that appeared to be a balloon in the Brooklyn Navy Yard in New York on March 8, 1955.
interesting points: The object displayed no indication of directional motion or drastic change of appearance.
The sighting lasted for approximately 5 minutes.
Other similar sightings of white flickering objects were reported in the New York City area.
The observers included a housewife and two marines, lending credibility to the sighting.
The sighting occurred at the Brooklyn Navy Yard, a military installation, which may have contributed to the reporting and investigation of the incident.
sighted object: a white flickering object that appeared to be a balloon
